name: Full Of Treasure
description:
CONTROLS: 
Arrow keys to move, Z to jump, Shift to pick up items, X to throw items

As you pick up more items, you will become heavier! When mostly empty, you are light enough to double jump, and when carrying a lot of weight, you will be able to smash through steel blocks.

The primary font used is Montreal, found here: https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/316
